text: Actions are judged by intentions, so each man will have what he intended...
arabic: إِنَّمَا الْأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ وَإِنَّمَا لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مَا نَوَى...

text: Islam has been built on five [pillars]: testifying that there is no deity worthy of worship except Allah and that Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah...
Islam has been built upon five: testifying that there is no god but Allah...
Whoever innovates something in this matter of ours that is not of it will have it rejected.
Every action is judged by its intention...
